author: Special Correspondent
text:
The City Crime Branch have arrested three persons on the charge of stealing Rs.1.34 crore meant for filling in Automated Teller Machines (ATM) on different occasions.

The cheating came to light when a team of officials of a company, which was carrying out outsourcing work of filling cash in ATMs, inspected the balance in ATMs recently on suspicion that ATMs were being loaded less cash than the stipulated amount by some of the employees, sources said.

Based on a complaint, the police arrested James (36) of Edatheru, Murthy (40) of Sathara Street in Srirangam and Ravichandran (28) of Sakthi Nagar in Srirangam. Cash of Rs. 5.68 lakh had been seized from them.
title: Three arrested on theft charge
